name: EKAuthorizationStatus
desc: The current authorization status for a specific entity type.

items.name: case authorized
items.desc: The app is authorized to access the service.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user explicitly denied access to the service for the app.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user has not yet made a choice regarding whether the app may access the service.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The app is not authorized to access the service.
